data.title: California’s Pot Chief Vows State Will Meet Compliance Deadline
data.excerpt: California’s chief marijuana regulator on Thursday told a gathering of growers, government officials and would-be entrepreneurs that the state will have a regulatory structure in place to oversee a developing multibillion-dollar cannabis market by Jan.
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
